titles.title: To amend title V of the Social Security Act to convert funding for personal responsibility education programs from direct appropriations to an authorization of appropriations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 112-63.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 31.

bill.summary: 4/27/2011--Reported to House without amendment. Amends title V (Maternal and Child Health Services) of the Social Security Act to change the funding mechanism for personal responsibility education programs from direct appropriations to an authorization of appropriations, and rescinds unobligated funds available to such programs.
